name: go-horse-db
description: Go Horse DB is a REST-based database, built on top of lowdb package, a small JSON database for Node.

scripts.dev: set DEBUG_MODE=true && set AUTH_MODE=true && set AUTH_TOKEN_READ=mudar123 && node src/index.js
scripts.dev-encrypt: set DEBUG_MODE=true && set ENCRYPTION_MODE=true && node src/index.js

author: Andrew Solera (andrewsolera@gmail.com)
